title: CodeHub Platform
description: Modern platform for developers to share, discover, and collaborate on code snippets with secure authentication, 70+ language support, real-time collaboration, and notification system.
solution: Created a collaborative code sharing platform with real-time editing capabilities, supporting 70+ programming languages and enabling developers to share and discover code snippets efficiently.

title: NatureGrain E-commerce
description: Premium organic food e-commerce platform with product browsing, shopping cart, JWT authentication, admin dashboard for inventory and analytics.
solution: Developed a complete e-commerce solution for organic food products with secure payment processing, inventory management, and analytics dashboard for business insights.

title: SoleStore Footwear
description: Modern footwear e-commerce with product filtering, shopping cart, wishlist, order history, and efficient admin system.
solution: Built a modern e-commerce platform for footwear with advanced filtering, wishlist functionality, and comprehensive admin panel for managing products and orders.

title: HuongBien Restaurant
description: Desktop system for restaurant operations with table reservations, customer loyalty, billing, employee management, and revenue analytics.
solution: Developed a comprehensive desktop application for restaurant management including table reservations, customer loyalty programs, billing system, and revenue analytics.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Modern portfolio with React 19, TailwindCSS 4, Three.js animations, SEO optimization, and responsive design.
solution: Created a modern, responsive portfolio website with 3D animations, SEO optimization, and smooth user experience to showcase professional work and skills.
